column4: well im a new ubuntu user i've installed in my netbook a week ago i was able to open a online game called tibia but now i try and it don't open i've readed that i would be my graphic aceleration but i dont know how to check if i have a graphic card installed in my pc and how to activate the graphic aceleration can anyone help me please?
there you go, you have intel graphics so you don't need to install any drivers
